dollarization.translation[0].definitions: a situation in which countries outside the US want to use the dollar rather than their own country’s money
dollarization.translation[1].definitions: when people in countries outside the US prefer to use the dollar, rather than their country’s own currency
High inflation has led many Russians to hold US dollars rather than roubles. This dollarisation is only now starting to reverse.
when a country makes its currency the same value as the dollar, or keeps its currency at the same rate in relation to the dollar
